name: PokQuest
description:
This game was made in 3 days for a private GameJam on the PuzzleQuest theme and mobile games.

In a world full of Pokemonsters. You must win your duels to have the chance to fight in the most prestigious arenas of the valley.

  • Raphaël Stella - Programmer
  • Antoine Cuvilliez - Game Art
  • Lionel Martin - Game Art
  • Clément Rigolli - Game Design
